greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least number with the same prime signature as 1 + A002322(n), where A002322 is Carmichael's lambda.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: A046523(n) = { my(f=vecsort(factor(n)[, 2], , 4), p); prod(i=1, #f, (p=nextprime(p+1))^f[i]); };  \\ This function from _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 17 2011
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 05 2017
